repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Front guard folio has title : Siddhānta[leśasa] (these letters are lost because of the shelf mark sticker glued over it.) ṃgraha vyākhyāna dvidi kṛṣṇadevīryoya is written in Devanagari with ink pen. 2 blank folio at beginning after the guard folio. Granth letters are used for numeration in the left margin on the verso of the folio.

msItem.title: Commentary on Siddhāntaleśasaṃgraha of Appayadīkṣita
msItem.author: Acyutakṛṣṇānandatīrtha
msItem.incipit: (1v 1) vyākhyātoyaṃ paricchedaḥ śrīkṛṣṇaparinuṣṭaye . ño meviśveśvarakṣetraṃ viśveśvarasamo (1v 2) gurūḥ .
msItem.explicit: (130v 8) ya viśeṣaṇaṃ tadanuguṇeti aiśvaryānuguṇetyarthaḥ samṛddhatvamiśvarabhāvāvakti viśeṣaṇaṃ
msItem.finalRubric:
(130v 8) iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmat
(131r 1) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) svayaṃ prakāśānandasarasvatīdīvyaśrīcaraṇāravidasaṃlagnarajobhutasyācyutakṛṣṇānandatirthasya kṛtau śāsti siddhāntaleśasaṃgrahavyākhyāyāṃ kṛṣṇālaṃ
(131r 2) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) kārākhyāyāṃ caturthaḥ paricchedassamāptaḥ …. …
msItem.colophon:
(131r 2) hariḥ oṃ .. śrīkṛṣṇacaraṇaṃvandve stfRAnmaMgaM? prade . ñogindreye? kṛtiriyamalaṃ kā
(131r 3) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) rārthamapitā oṃ namasteśrīkṛṇṣanmata śrīkṛṣṇatmanasādhyatva śrīkṛṣṇaṃ saṃpraṇamya ca . vyākhyātoyaṃ paricchedaḥ śrīkṛṣṇaparinuṣṭaye ……
(131r 4) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) śrīrukmaṇīsatyabhāmāhemāmbunādhikā sameta śrīrāmagopālasvāmine namaḥ …. śrīsītālakṣmaṇabharataśatrughnahanumatsametaśrī (131r 5) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) rāmacandrasvāmine namaḥ …. srīmatśaṃkarānandadeśikacaraṇāravindābhyānnamaḥ …. kalpakāṃbāsameta śrīmadaśniśvarasvāmine namaḥ ….
(131r 6) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ …. .. (flower design) …. (flower design) … (flower design) śrīvāyavarabrahmaṇe namaḥ .. … hariḥ oṃ
(131r 7) (broken corner) viśvāpasaṃvatsare caitramāse śuklapakṣe saptamitithyāṃ bṛguvāsare śāstrasiddhāntaleśasaṃgrahavyākhyā kṛṣṇālaṃkārākhyā samāptā … hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu .

support.p: palm leaf used as support folio. Guard folio are broken at the edges.

extent.measure: 2 guard folio, 4 blank folio, 131 written folio.

supportDesc.foliation: Granth letters used for numeration in the left margin on the verso of the folio.
supportDesc.condition: good state of preservation despite marginal broken folio.

additions.desc: Front guard has folio title : Siddhānta[leśasa] (these letters are lost because of the shelf mark sticker glued over it.) ṃgraha vyākhyāna dvidi kṛṣṇadevīryoya is written in Devanagari with ink pen.

origin.origDate: The manuscript is completed on Thursday, 7th day of the śuklapakṣa of the Chaitra month of the year 1905-1906 (viśvavasusaṃvatsara). It corrosponds with the 28th March 1983 Monday.

encodingDesc.p: spaces are added to separate words.

TEI.text:
(1v 1) śrīkṛṣṇatmanasādhyatva śrīkṛṣṇaṃ saṃpraṇamya ca . vyākhyātoyaṃ paricchedaḥ śrīkṛṣṇaparinuṣṭaye . ño meviśveśvarakṣetraṃ viśveśvarasamo (1v 2) gurūḥ .
(130v 8) ya viśeṣaṇaṃ tadanuguṇeti aiśvaryānuguṇetyarthaḥ samṛddhatvamiśvarabhāvāvakti viśeṣaṇaṃ iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīmat
(131r 1) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) svayaṃ prakāśānandasarasvatīdīvyaśrīcaraṇāravidasaṃlagnarajobhutasyācyutakṛṣṇānandatirthasya kṛtau śāsti siddhāntaleśasaṃgrahavyākhyāyāṃ kṛṣṇālaṃ
(131r 2) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) kārākhyāyāṃ caturthaḥ paricchedassamāptaḥ …. … (131r 2) hariḥ oṃ .. śrīkṛṣṇacaraṇaṃvandve stfRAnmaMgaM? prade . ñogindreye? kṛtiriyamalaṃ kā
(131r 3) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) rārthamapitā oṃ namasteśrīkṛṇṣanmata śrīkṛṣṇatmanasādhyatva śrīkṛṣṇaṃ saṃpraṇamya ca . vyākhyātoyaṃ paricchedaḥ śrīkṛṣṇaparinuṣṭaye ……
(131r 4) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) śrīrukmaṇīsatyabhāmāhemāmbunādhikā sameta śrīrāmagopālasvāmine namaḥ …. śrīsītālakṣmaṇabharataśatrughnahanumatsametaśrī (131r 5) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) rāmacandrasvāmine namaḥ …. srīmatśaṃkarānandadeśikacaraṇāravindābhyānnamaḥ …. kalpakāṃbāsameta śrīmadaśniśvarasvāmine namaḥ ….
(131r 6) (gap of a few letters due to broken folio.) karakṛtamaparādhaṃ kṣantumarhanti santaḥ …. .. (flower design) …. (flower design) … (flower design) śrīvāyavarabrahmaṇe namaḥ .. … hariḥ oṃ
(131r 7) (broken corner) viśvavasusaṃvatsare caitramāse śuklapakṣe saptamitithyāṃ bhṛguvāsare śāstrasiddhāntaleśasaṃgrahavyākhyā kṛṣṇālaṃkārākhyā samāptā … hariḥ oṃ śubhamastu .
